title: SIC! SIC! SIC!
html:
SIC! SIC! SIC!

“Gook: Derisive slang for Koreans; a corruption of the Korean han'guk saram, which means 'Korean.' [From U.S. News & World Report, 25 June 1990:36. Submitted by Charles Mendoza, North Miami.]
